page.title: 04TRANSPORT FIRMS
page.content: There are three transport firms in this area.{Capper&Lamb,Irwins,&Fee. Capper&Lamb employ 48 people and have 24 lorries.Makes of lorries,ERF,DAF, VOLVO.Loads carried, chickens,tiles, frozen foods,meal,fertlizers and bulk protein.Destination of loads England, Ireland & Scotland. John Fee is self-employed.He has one lorry,a Seddon-Atkinson.Building blocks and ash from power stations are carried to Belfast. Irwin Transport employ 7 people and have 15 lorries.Makes of lorries are SCANIA,DAF,BEDFORD and LEYLAND.Loads- Beef,Potatoes and apples.Destination of loads is the U.K.
